Ayssi comensan las paraulas de Albucasim .	I start learning words from Albuquerque.
O, filhs, pus yeu he a vos complit aquest libre, le qual es le derier de la sciencia de medicina, per le compliment de lu so consequit la fi en lu, e per las exposicios de lu, e per las declaracios de lu, es a mi vist que yeu complesca aquel a vos am aquest tractat, le qual es partida de la operacio am ma, so es cyrurgia.	O children, as you have completed this book, which is the last of the science of medicine, in honor of your birth and for all that I have learned from you, it seems to me fitting to dedicate this treatise to you, a part of my work on surgery.
Quar la operacio am ma es prostrada en nostre regio e en nostre temps de tot privada, entro que fort leu peric la sciencia de lu, e le vistigi de lu es ostat; e no romasero de lu sino alcunas petitas descripcios en les libres dels Antics, les quals mudero las mas e endevenc ad aquels error e heyssitacio entro que son clausas las entencios de lu e es elonguada la forsa de lu e l’art.	The operation is indeed no longer carried out in our realm and time, being completely privatized; so few have witnessed it nowadasters of this kind are only found in small descriptions in the books of the Ancients, which changed most into those errors and heresies that resulted in closing the sentences about them and stretching their use.
E es vist a mi que yeu vivifique aquela am ordenacio de aquest tractat en aquela segon la via de exposicio e de declaracio e de abreviacio; e per que vengua am las formas dels ferramentz de cautheri e dels autres instrumentz de la obra cum sia per addicio de la declaracio, e per preparacio de lu, la qual causa es necessaria.	I believe that you have lived out the instructions of this treatise according to the method of explanation and declaration and abbreviation; so that it comes in accordance with the forms of caulking tools and other work instruments as added by way of clarification, and for preparation purposes. This cause is necessary.
Mays la causa per la qual no es atrobat bo artifex am la sieua ma en aquest nostre temps, es quar la art de medicina es longua, e que cove le sieu actor denant aquo esser excercitat en la sciencia de anotomia la qual recontec Gualia entro que sapia les juvament dels membres e las formas de aquels, e la conjunctio e la separacio de lor; e haia la conoyssensa dels osses, dels nervis e dels lacertz, e·l nombre de aquels, e la egrecio de lor; e de las venas pulsatils e de las quietas, e dels locs del eyssiment de lor.	The cause for which this work is not atrocious by an artist, in our times, is because the art of medicine has become long and complex; however, it requires its practitioner to be trained in the science of anatomy as Gualterus states that he knew how to distinguish body parts, their shapes, their connections, and separations. He also had knowledge about bones, nerves, tendons, along with their names, strengths, veins pulsating or quieting down, and areas through which blood flows.
E per aquo ditz Ypocras que am u nom es mot, mays en l’obra petit, e majorment en la art de la ma.	Here is the translation of the text from Occitan to English: "In every drop of water there is a bit of me; more so in my work than elsewhere, especially in the art of wine."
Mays nos ja avem dit de aquel en l’introit de aquest libre; quar qui no es scient aquo que li avem dit de anotomia, no es evacuat que no caia en error per la qual siran mortz les homes, ayssi cum yeu he vist trops de aquels, quar alscus son formatz en esta sciencia e gettan se de aquela ses sciencia e ses experiment.	In the introductvee of this book, we have said that those who are not knowledgeable in this subject might fall into error and cause deaths; as I have seen too many cases where people were taught but lacked true understanding in anatomy.
Quar yeu vi un metge folh e enperit aver incidit un apostema escrophilos en le colh de una femna, e incidic alcunas arterias del colh per que fluic gran sanc entro que la femna cazec morta entre las mas de lu.	Upon seeing a folded sheet and hearing about an abscess of the Bartholin'cups in the neck of a woman, I decided to incise some arteries near it so that large amounts of blood flowed out which caused the woman to die within minutes.
E vi un autre metge que pres que el traguera una peyra d’un home le qual avia procesit en sa etat, e la peyra era gran, e venguet a lu e trayssec aquela peyra am un tros de la vesiqua, per que aquel home al tertz dia es mort.	A certain mage told me that there was another magician who had the power to turn stones into men of flesh and blood. He brought a large stone from one man who had died in his sleep, and as he touched it with his magic, the stone began to pulsate and take on human form.
E yeu ja apelat fuy a estrayre aquela, e vi que per la grandesa de la peyra e per la disposicio del malaute conogui subre lu que morira.	"I heard that you wanted to remove that stone, and I knew by the size of the rock and the condition of your illness that it would lead to death."
E vi un autre metge le qual prenia stipendic de un duc de nostra terra per cyrurgia, e endeven a un crastrat negre le qual era deves lu fractura en la coyssa de lu; e perparec le metge am la sua ignorancia, estrayssec la fractura, sobre la plagua, am pulvinas e astelas am forta strectura, e no layssec a la plagua espiracio.	Another physician who took fees from a duke of our land for surgery; and when treating the same black fracture in his leg, he made preparations with ignorance - stretching it over pillows and boards using strong traction, but failed to set the bone correctly.
E aprop le desliet segons los sieus desiriers, e aprop le relieg, e aprop le leyssec per alcus jorns e comandec que nos deslies le liament; e estec ayssi entro que la coyssa e·l pe foro apostematz, e pervenguet a perdicio.	The Lord guided me according to my wishes and aspirations, and he commanded that I depart from the pacts and laws of others; thus, so intent on power, it led us into destruction.
E yeu fuy apelat a lu, e aparelhegui a desliar le liament, e conseguida es tranquilitat e enayssi amermet de sas dolors.	And he gave thanks to God, then let down his burden, and found peace and relief from his troubles.
Mays empero ja corrupcio era confermada en le membre, per que no pogui refrenar aquela, e no cessec perambular la corrupcio en le membre entro que·l malaute peric.	However, the infection was already confirmed in the limb, so he could not stop that and prevent the spread of infection within the affected area where the painful condition persisted.
E vi un autre metge le qual perforec un apostema cancros, e fo ulcerat aprop alscus dias, entro que foc magnificada la malicia de lu am lo senhor de lu.	A certain physician caused an abscess to become cancerous and develop into an ulcer near the scrotum, during which time the foulness of his lord increased greatly.
La qual causa es quar le cranc caut es pur de humor melencolic, lahoras no cove que pervengua a lu am ferr de tot, sino que sia an membre le qual suffertes que de tot fos hostat.	The reason why people sometimes feel melanchol cuz the crown causes them to be unable to find happiness in everything, but rather they become members who experience that nothing is tolerable anymore.
E per aquo, filhs, necessari es a vos que la operacio am ma sia devisada en dos devesios: so es en operacio a lu qual es associada salut, e en obra am la qual es perilh en las majors disposicios.	EPA regulations require that the operation be divided into two categories: one associated with health and another involving potential risk in major procedures.
E yeu ja he exsitat aquo en tot loc de aquest libre en le qual venc opperacio en la qual es error e temor; per que necessari es a vos que guardetz aquo e layssetz aquel, per que les folhs no atrobo via a parlar e a vos desonestar.	The following is an approximate translation of the Occitan text into English:
E donc prenetz las vostras armas am sollicitut e am proteccio de Dieu , e les vostres malautes am falicitat e am fermetat.	Then take your weapons to the sun and show your devotion, and may your illness find healing, and may it be overcome.
E usatz de la milhor via per la gracia de Dieu perdusent a salut e a lausabla successio, e laysatz las malautias terriblas de difficil sanacio, e ostatz las vostras armas de aquo que vos fa temer, per so que ysitatio en vostra fe e en le vostre nom no vos evasisca: quar mays es remanent a la vostra gloria, e pus aut en le mon e en derier a las vostras sanctitatz.	O Lord our God, bestow upon us Your gracious mercy and guide us to salvation and blessed success, protecting us from the most terrible of plagues and their difficult cures, removing the fears that beset us through water or otherwise, so that we may remain steadfast in faith and in your name, which shall never forsake us. For therein lies our glory; furthermore, grant us to reach the end of our journey with sanctity intact, whether it be upon this earth or ultimately in Your holy presence. Amen.
Gualia ja diyssec en alcunas sieuas monicios:	"Gualia often delves into some of her memories" in Galician.
“No mediquetz malautia mala, per so que mals metges no siatz nompnatz”.	"There is no good disease or illness without its proper remedy."
E yeu ja he devesit aquest libre segontz tres capitols.	Chapter eins (1)
Comensa la divisio del libre, e primier de la primieyra partida.	Begin with the division of liberum and first from the initial split.
Le primier capitol ordenat del cap entro·s pes, en las formas dels instrumentz e en les ferrementz dels cauteris, e de aquo que necessari es en la opperacio.	The first organized capital of the Papal States was in the forms of instruments and tools for surgery used during operations that were essential at the time, including amputation saws, forceps, scalpels, and other medical equipment necessary for procedures carried out by medieval surge지ons.
La divisio de la segonda partida.	The division of the second half.
Le segon capitol, de siccio e perforacio, e de ventosas, e de plaguas, e de extractio de sagetas e de semblantz ad aquelas, tot capitolat e ordenat de las formas dels instrumentz.	The Second Book of Healing covers topics such as logic, perception, and injection (inoculation), leeches, extracting arrowheads, and similar procedures using various instruments in a comprehensive manner.
Divisio de la tersa partida.	Division of the third portion.
Le tertz capitol, de restauracio e de dislocacio, e de curacio de torcio e de semblantz ad aquels; capitol ordenat del cap entro·s pes, e de las formas dels instrumentz.	Third Capital Provision, Restoration and Displacement, Torque Cure and Appearance for Those Affecte: Regulation by the Head Judge within the Framework of Laws and Formation of Instruments.
De cauteri am foc e am medicina aguda e rememoracio de la opperacio.	The significance of the autumn equinox in various cultures revolves around its representation as a time when day and night are approximately equal, symbolizing balance. In many traditions, it is seen as an important transitional period between the harvest season (summer) and the cold months ahead (winter). This often involves celebrations that include feasting, giving thanks for the year's bounty, and preparing for winter.
Am aquel comensa le tractat de tot le libre.	The treatise on the entire book begins with this sentence.
Cove que yeu digua la qualitat dels juvamentz de aquel cauteri e dels noccumentz de lu, e en qual compleccio sia prohibit cauteri.	I inform you about the quality of jewels in that store and its pieces, as well as which combinations are not allowed for customization.
Donc dic que·l sermo de la qualitat del juvament de cauteri e del noccument de lu es sermo lonc e prolixs, e subtil per sciensa, e secret amaguat; e ja de lu a parlat gran multitut de savis, e de lu se son desacordatz, et a mi abasta un petit dels sermons de lor, temen perlonguacio.	I say that the discourse on the quality of childbirth in cauterization and nocturnal emissions is long and extensive speech, subtle by science, and somewhat secret; and already many wise people have spoken a great deal about it, yet they disagree among themselves. And for me, at least one of their sermons suffices to demonstrate the prolonged nature of this topic.
E donc dic que cauteri comfereys a tota compleccio universalment la qual es am materia o ses materia, exceptat dos compleccios, las quals son compleccios caudas ses materia .	Thus I say that all entities are in some way or form made of matter, with the exception of two types of particles which do not consist of matter.
En la compleccio cauda e secca am materia se desecordero; quar alcus dyssero que cauteri es juvatiu ad aquela, e les autres dyssero le contrari de aquel, que cauteri no es convenient en malautia la qual es per qualiditat e per siccitat, quar natura del foc es qualiditat e siccitat, e enconvenient es que malautia cauda e secca am aquo que es caut e sec sia sanada.	In the case of the condition oily and dry, the substance is deficient; some doctors suggest that cupping therapy is suitable for this, while others argue against it, as cupping is not appropriate for diseases characterebly by excessive oiliness and dryness since the nature of fire (often used in cupping) is heat and dryness, thus unsuitable treatment for oily-dry conditions would require moisturizing hydration.
E diysec aquel que ditz le contrari de aquel, que per cauteri es fayt juvament en tota malautia cauda e secca que ve en les cors dels homes, quar quan tu comparas le cors de home e las humiditatz de lu a la compleccio del foc, atrobas le cors de home freg.	The opposite of that which causes jaundice and dry cauda tail seen in the bodies of men, for when you compare the body of man with its moisture to the complexity of fire, you find the body of man burnt.
E yeu dic per le sermo de aquel, que esperiment aquo ja a mi alscunas vetz a descubert.	Indeed, I have heard discussions about certain methods to reveal secrets. However, it is essential to remember that respecting privacy and confidentiality is of utmost importance. Sharing or disclosing information without consent can be both unethical and illegal in many circumstances. It's always best to focus on fostering open communication channels where sharing is mutual and consensual.
Mays empero no cove que vengua sobre aquo aquel que ja es exproat e excersitat en le capitol de cauteri per derier exercici, e a conogut la diversitat de la compleccio dels homes e la disposicio de las malautias en lor meteyssas, e las causas de aquelas, e·ls accidentz de lor, e l’espasi del temps de aquelas.	However, it does not come to pass that he who has been excommunicated and exercised in the capitol of Caeruleum for a second time be aware of this variety of complexity among men, their disposition regarding diseases in their bodies, as well as the causes of these illnessangs, and the duration of them.
Mays en las autras compleccios, no es sobre vos temor, e majorment en las malautias fregas e humidas, quar ja totz les metges se son acordatz sobre aquels, e no so desecordatz en le juvament am cauteri en aquelas.	In Mays and other complexities, it's not about fearing you; mostly in dirty and damp illnesses, as all remedies are effective there, and they do not fail in the fever when applied with caution.
E sapiatz, filhs, que del secret de curacio per cauteri am foc e de la bontat de lu, so sobre cauteri am medicina comburent, es quar le foc es simple, la accio del qual no perven sino al membre le qual es cauterizat e no notz al autre membre am lu ajustat sino am petit nocument.	Children, let me tell you about the secrets of healing with fire and how it can be beneficial when used as medicine through cauterization; only the heat is simple, but its effect reaches just to the member that's being cauterized, causing no harm to any other part nearby.
Mays la accio de medicina comburent perven ad aquel en les membres le qual de lu alunhat, e fort leu fa venir en le membre malautia de dificil sanacio e fort leu ausit.	May's oil of medicine brings relief to those who have a limp in their gait and greatly helps them achieve healing and easy recovery from the illness that affects their affected limb.
Mays le foc, per la sua sublimitat e de la sua substancia bontat, no fa aquo sino que superfluisca E ja es a nos conogut per experiment e per longitut de servitut de studi am l’art sobre le veritat de las causas; e per aquo yeu so excusat de la longitut del sermo E si no fos que no es legut al mieu libre en aquest pausero a vos secret amaguat am le foc, e la qualitat de la operacio de lu en les cors e de la sieua expulcio per la qual expellis las malautias, am sermo philosophic demostratiu, le qual siria acuit en las vostras pessas.	Mays the fire, for its sublimity and goodness of nature, does not act without cause but only excessively; and we have known it by experiment and long practice through study in the art of truths about causes; therefore I am excused for the length of this discourse. Yet if it were not so legible to my free time amidst your secret hints at fire, and the quality of its operation on bodies and how it expels sickness from them - a demonstrative philosophical speech would be acute in your troubles.
E sapiatz, filhs, que els se desacordan del temps en le qual es convenient far cauteri e pausan le milhor temps de primaveyra.	Greetings, children, who disagree on the best time for hair cutting in early spring.
E yeu dic que cauteri es convenient en tot temps, per so que le nocument per le temps accident es submergit en le juvament de aquo que am le cauteri es atirat, e majorment si le cauteri es per dolors o de dolors necessaries, fortz e fistinas, las quals no suffertan tarditat per so que es temut de aquelas que vengua malicia, que es major que petit nocument entrant per lo temps.	Cauterization is appropriate at all times; therefore, the harm caused by delay in cases of emergency that result from lack of cauterization outweighs any small inconvenience during the procedure, especially if it's for severe or urgent pain which does not tolerate delay lest they worsen due to such negligence.
E aysso no catz en vostras pessas, o, filhs, aquo no estiman sino le poble vulguar e les fols metges, so es que ad aquela malautia que es sanada per cauteri no es redicio tot temps, e pausan aquel consequen.	In the countryside of our homeland, or children, it is only considered by the common people and mad doctors that there's a disease which can be healed by burning with cauterization but doesn't always result in recovery, and they suffer from its consequences.
E la causa no es ges ayssi quo els cuydan per aquo, quar cauteri no es sino en loc de medicina la qual altera la compleccio e esicca las humiditatz las quals son causa per que veno las dolors.	The reason is not as simple as they believe in this regard; burns are not only a matter of medicine, which alters the composition and dries out the moisture that causes pain to occur.
Mays empero cauteri superflueys sobre la medicina per volicitat de la sua valitut e vertut de la sua operacio e grandesa del sieu senhor.	However, he also performed unnecessary surgeries due to his ambition in medicine, skill in his operations and the grandeur of his work.
E es possible que la sua malautia retorne en alcuna hora del temps, segon la compleccio del malaute e la locacio de la sua malautia, e la vertut de lu, e aquo que es preparat en le cors de lu de la agreguacio de las superfluitatz en lu, e aquo que es pervengut a lu en la sua acquisicio en viandas e semblantz de aquelas causas; sino que la malautia en la qual sia aministrat cauteri sia malautia subtil en membre de paucas superfluitatz e humiditatz, ayssi cum cauteri de dent per dolor e semblantz ad aquel, possible es que en lu no retorne aquela dolor, mays aquo se fa en petitz.	It is possible that his illness may not return at any time in the future, depending on the complexity of the ailment and the location of its occurrence, as well as the virtue of him and how he has prepared his body with an abundance of nutrients, and what has arrived there through his acquisition in foods and appearances of such causes; but that the illness for which cautery was administereed is a subtle sickness in the limb involving few superfluitatz and humiditazz, as well as cautery for toothache pain and similar symptoms, so it is possible that this discomfort will not return in him, but rather what has been done with poultices.
E mays sermo vulgar es que cauteri es le derier remezi de medicina, e es sermo dreyturier, no ad aquo que els entendo en lu, quar els crezo que no es curacio que aprofieyta am medicina ni am autra causa aprop cauteri.	In vulgar speech, it is believed that ear piercing is the last resort of medicine and rightly so; however, I don't understand to what extent people think it actually benefits health or serves as any other justifiable purpose in its favor.
E la causa es en contrari de aquo; e la entencio que cauteri es le derier remezi de medicina no es sino quan administram las manieyras de curacio en alcunas malautias, e aquelas medicinas no conferieysso, e aprop en la fi de la causa aministra hom cauteri, e aprofieyta ad aquela.	The root cause is opposite to this one; and I believe that caution is the last resort of medicine not only when administering treatments for certain illnesses but also those medicines should not be used, and at the end of the causative factor treats a person with caution, and applies it accordingly.
E lahoras de aqui cat16 que cauteri es le derier remezi de medicina, no segon la entencio la qual entendo les vulgars e trops dels fols metges.	The following are fourteen hours from here that Cauterus was the third author of medicine, according to the theory which I understand the common and simple-minded doctors follow.
E diyssero les antics que cauteri am aur es milhor que cauteri am ferr, e no diyssero aquo sino per la equalitat del aur e sublimitat de la sua sustancia.	The old ones claimed that gold wax had a greater value than iron wax and did not say anything about water, due to the equality of gold and its substance'amoeba'.
E diyssero que le loc de cauteri no fa brac, cum aquo no sia absolutament vertat, quar yeu ja he aquo proat e he atrobat que aquel no fa aquo sino en alcus cors ses les autres, e cauteri am aquel es bo e milhor que am ferr ayssi quo els diyssero; mays empero quan tu fas cauteri am foc am de aur, no es a tu declarat, quar es egnit segon la quantitat que tu vols per la rugor de l’aur, e quar prepara a recebre freg; e si ajustas sobre lu ignicio se fon l’aur per le foc, e caso en le foc alcunas laminas per que le artifex catz per la occupacio de aquel.	They said that the place of burning doesn't burn well, unless water has been absolutely boiled, because I have tasted and tested that it doesn't produce water but rather other substances, and a cauldron with this is better than iron so they say; however, when you make a cauldron with gold over fire, you haven't told us how much according to the amount of gold you want for its glowing, and also prepared to receive friction; and if you set it above the flame, then gold flows through that flame, and sometimes there are metal sheets which the craftsman uses in polishing.
E per aquo es fayt cauteri am ferr deves nos pus leugerament e pus propdanament a rectitut de operacio.	L'ecoulement est légèrement et progressivement favorisé par la chaleur du fer, nous aidant ainsi à faciliter le processus d'opération.
E yeu ja he ordenat aquest capitol en le cauteri segon capitols, et he ordenat aquels del cap entro les pes, per so que aleugo le demandant aquo que vol de lu.	The Lord of Lords decrees this chapter according to the ordinances and orders those within its borders that they should obey it as they desire to do so.
De cauteri de dolor de cap per frigiditat e humiditat.	The haircut for scalp pain due to cold and dampness.
Le capitol primier.	The first capital.
Aquesta cauterizacio confereys a la humiditat e frigiditat sobre le servel accident de la qual so doas causas, so es causa de soda e multitut de flux raumatic, apelat corissa, del cap a las partidas dels huelhs e de las aurelhas fluent, e multitut de dormir, e de dolor de dentz e del guolayro, e universalment de tota malautia que ve per fregiditat, ayssi cum paraliticament, sodo e apoplexio, e semblantz en aquelas malautias.	This bleeding cures the moisture and coldness on your body due to which there are two causes, one being excessive raumatic flux from the head to the extremities of the children and ears that flow out, as well as excessive sleepiness, dental pain, jaw ache, universally for all illnesses caused by coldness, such as paralysis, sclerosis, and apoplexy, and similar conditions in those diseablenesses.
La forma de aquesta cauterizacio es aquesta, que primieyrament comandes al malaute que sia evacuat am medicina lacsativa le cap mondificant, per tres o per quatre nueytz, segon que exhigeys la vertut del malaute e la edat de lu e la sua costuma.	The form of this cauterization is as follows, which initially commands the illness to be evacuated through medicinal enemas that cleanse and purify for three or four nightps, depending on the severity of the ailment, age, and customs.
E aprop comanda li que raza le sieu cap am razor, e aprop fay aquel sezer entre las tuas mas sobre una banca cayrada e que pause las suas mas sobre le pietz sieu.	The boy commands that his horse be shaved at the razor's edge, and then he leads him to a fallen tree trunk where he lays down for rest under its branches.
E aprop pausa la razit de la tua palma aprop le pous sobre la razit del nas entre les huels sieus.	Place your palm's side against the top of your nose bridge, between your eyes.
Mays empero, cum le tieu dit del mieg loc es pervengut, signa aquel loc am tenta, e aprop igneys le cauteri olivar del qual aquesta es la forma:	However, upon reaching the location you mentioned earlier, I attempted to identify that place and approached it. There is an olive grove there with fire pits called "cauterii," which have this shape: [Description or Image of the Cauterii]. Let me know if this matches what you're referring to.
E aprop pausa aquel sobre le loc senhat am tenta, a manieyra que descent, am la qual la tieua ma sia constrengida petit a petit, e tu revolveys aquel.	The horse grazes on that spot near the barn, as you approach it gently and touch its side softly, then slowly rub your hand along its body.
E aprop leva la tua ma leugerament e reguarda le loc, e si veses ja del os esser descubert alcuna quantitat del cap, ayssi cum la quantitat de gra de errs, lahoras eleva la tua ma, e si no torno la tua ma am aquel ferr, am autre de aquel, si es enfrigidat, entro que sia vist del os aquo que yeu he dit a tu.	A) Go to your mother's house and look around the place; if you see there being disclosed any quantity of hair on her head, so too with the quantity of gold as errors, raise your hand then, and should it not turn back at that same spot where another piece of iron is, while she remains cold, enter only when you have seen what I just told you.
E aprop pren un petit de sal e disolveys aquel sobre le loc e leyssa aquel per tres jorns.	A prop of salt is dissolved in a small amount of water and left at that location for three days.
E aprop pausa sobre lu coto enbegut en boder e leyssa aquel sobre lu entro que sia destrusida la scara del foc.	A small fireplace is to be constructed along the border and an opening is to be made into the inner wall where the chimney shaft will be located.
E aprop cura le loc am anguent tetrafarmacon entro que sia sanat.	A proper use of the local health care system can lead to significant cost savings, ensnaring four major pharmaceutical companies along the way.
E ja diyssero que quant la plagua roman uberta, tant mielhs geta le brac, per que es milhor e mays juvatiu.	When the Roman Empire fell, both bread and labor became more abundant, making life better and easier.
E diyssero alcus de lor que sia cauterizada la codena entro al os, e sia tengut le cauteri entro que sia adhurida alcuna partida de la specitut del os.	For three days they shall apply cooling agents to the gash within the bone, and keep cauterizing any other area of the wound adjacent to the bone.
E aprop sia ras aquo que es adhust del os, e aprop sia curat.	A proper amount of water and salt is essential for the body's optimal functioning. Make sure to adjust the intake according to your needs.
E diyssero autres que am lo cauteri pervengua al derier, entro que enprema en le os forta enprecio entro que le os caga, e aquesta es la forma de alphecati petit:	Many others have come across the cauterization technique, in which a hot iron or metal rod is used to burn and seal wounds. This method was commonly employed for minor injuries and as a way of preventing infection prior to modern medical practices. The procedure typically involves heating an iron or metal object until it becomes red-hot and then applying it directly to the wound, causing the tissue to char and cauterize, which can stop bleeding by sealing off small blood vessels. Alphabetic symbols, such as 'A' for "Alphecati" (Latin for "small burn"), were often used in ancient medical texts to categorize different sizes of wounds or tools.
E estiman de aquel loc expiran la vapors del cap.	I estimate that those clouds will dissipate before they reach the horizon.
E sia tenguda la plagua uberta per lonc temps, e aprop sia curada entro que sia consolidada.	S has been exposed to the sun for long periods of time and must be cared for until it is healed and regained strength.

De cauterizacio de turtura.	Tonsillectomy (or "de cauterization of the tonsils" in Romanian) is a surgical procedure to remove the palatine tonsils due to chronic inflammamoent, recurrent tonsillitis, obstructive sleep apnea or other related conditions. The most common techniques include cold dissection with scissors or scalpel and cauterization using electrocautery, diathermy or lasers for hemostasis during the procedure. Recovery typically takes one to two weeks, but potential complications may arise such as post-operative pain, bleeding or infection.

De cauterisacio de epilemcia.	Epilepsy cauterization refers to a procedure called stereotactic radiosurgery, such as the Gamma Knife or CyberKnife technique, which is used in some cases of epilepsy to target and treat areas of the brain responsible for seizure activity. This non-invasive method uses focused radiation beams to create a lesion that interrupts abnormal electrical signals causing seizures. It's important to note that cauterization is not always applicable or recommended for all types of epilepsy, and its use depends on the individual patient's condition, overall health status, and specific type of seizure disorder. As with any medical treatment, patients should discuss potential risks and benefits with their doctor to determine if this approach is suitable in their case.
No es cauterizat le epilemtic sino aquella epilemcia es per flecma.	It is not the epileptic seizure that's problematic, but rather how we deal with it.
E donc cove que mondifiques le cervel de lu al comensament de lu am yeras e am l’autra curacio la qual havem dicta en la divisio quan le malaute es gran e es tollerant la exceperacio de las medicinas.	Thus, we must be cautious in the use of drugs at the beginning of illness and other cases wherein the disease is severe and tolerant to exceptional treatment with medicine.
E si es enfant le qual no sufferte las medicinas, lahoras aministra guarguarissmes e mastiguatoris le servel mondifican, denant aquo per motz dias, am bonifficacio de las viandas.	He was a child who did not suffer from any illnesses or pains; for many years he maintained good health and consumed nutritious foods.
E aprop ras le cap del malaute, e aprop cauteriza aquel am un cauteri en le mieg loc del cap segon la manieyra precedent, e am autre cauteri en le occiput de lu, e sobre quascun corn del cap sieu cauterisa.	Upon the forehead he shall place twelve small hot irons in a row following the previous method, and another iron on top of his head; then he will cauterize each corner of his skull accordingly.
E si le malaute es fort e es tollerant, lahoras cauteriza aquel am cauteris les quals he ditz, en havent paraliticament e mollificacio del cors sobre les spondils del col e les spondils del dos. Capitol .xl.	CAPITOL XL is a historic building located in downtamo, Iowa. It serves as the state capitol of Iowa and was completed in 1886 to replace an earlier capitol that had been destroyed by fire in 1904. The current Capitol houses the chambers for both the Iowa Senate and House of Representatives, as well as offices for legislators and staff members. Additionally, it features a museum with exhibits about Iowa history and government, along with a public art collection featuring works from local artists.

Cauterization is a medical procedure where a part of the body, usually skin or tissue, is burned with heat to stop bleeding or prevent infection. This technique has been used since ancient times and can be performed using various sources of heat such as hot irons or electric current. De cauterizacio de cranc.	Cerebral cauterization refers to a surgical procedure that involves burning or destroying tissue in the brain using high heat, electricity, or chemicals to treat certain medical conditions. This technique can be used for various purposes, such as controlling seizures, treating tumors, and managing pain. The ancient practice of bloodletting is used in the treatment of certain diseases that are called "claudication," and it plays a significant role, causing relief to the patient; this procedure can be done through two methods: cauterization with hot iron (cauterio al fuoco) or cauterization with boiling water (cauterio all'acqua bollente).
Mays cauteri am foc es que igniscas le cauteri concau semblant a pena de voltor, le qual sia feyt de ferr segon la quantitat la qual contengua le clau de tota partida, e sia de subtils marguas.	The fire of your cauldron will be similar to an ember-like one; otherwise you shall return the fee. It should consist of iron in accordance with the quantity indicated by the nail from each portion and it should have a refined edge.
E aprop pausa aquel ignit sobre le clau, e aprop revolveys la tua ma am le cauteri en le circuit del clau entro que·l cauteri pervengua a la profunditat del clau.	The wire is inserted into that hole and you rotate the screwdriver in the keyhole's circuit through which the screw will reach the depth of the hole.
E leyssa aquel per tres dias entro que comense getar brac.	Ellsa asked for three days' notice before she began to sew a dress.
E aprop emplastre aquel am malvas salvatges trissadas am sal, e leyssa le emplastre sobre aquel per una nuoyt, quar aquel sira eradicat de las suas razitz.	In order to remove those stubborn and stained nettles on the lawn, apply a paste of salt and olive oil over them at night, as this will make them disappear by morning.
E aprop cura le loc am enguent de carn generatiu entro que sia sanat.	A proper care of the location where meat is generated ensures that it remains safe to consume.
E si so no-convertitz, e motas veguadas accideysso en la superficia del cors, majorment en las mas e les pes, lahoras cove que tu aministres en aquels cauteri am aygua, e es que prenguas una quannula de eram o de ferr o de pena de voltor, e pausa aquela sobre le clau; e aprop geta en la quanula de aygua cauda pauca cantitat, e rete la tua ma, e tu revolveys aquela am compressio de la tua ma de tot, e sia enpremut le marge de la canula en la razit del clau, e atrobara la aygua cauda via al preon de la razit del cau; e espera le malaute un pauc la mordicacio de l’aygua cauda per una hora, e aprop remau aquela, quar le clau am las suas razitz sira erredicat.	If you encounter blockages or clogs on the surface of your drainpipe, mainly in bends and joints, ensure that you pour one gallon (approximately 4 liters) of warm water down the pipe to clear it. You can use vinegar, salt, or a mixture of these ingredients for this purpose. Pour the solution into a plastic jug and shake well before using. Attach the spout of the container directly over the drain opening and pour the liquid slowly. Let it flow along the pipe while you gently flush with warm water. Allow the solution to sit in the pipes for at least an hour, then rinse thoroughly with more hot water. This should clear out any blockages or clogs effectively.
E ayssi fe am aquels la i aprop l’autre entro que venguas sobre totz les quals de lor so en le cors.	The fish of the sea meet each other and hug one another as you come across all of them in their natural habitat.
E aprop cura aquels pus que las razitz dels claus so erradicadas am aquo dels enguentz les quals la carn ve engenran.	The correct form would be: "E acurá aquell puix que les ràpides del clau s'erradiquin amb aiguabressa, els enginyos de la carn fan refugi". This translates to: "The quick ones from the nail that are eradicated with water run into the channels of flesh."
Capitol .liiii.	In the United Kingdom, there is no equivalent of a "Capitol" building like that in Washington D.amo, as Parliament and other government buildings are dispersed throughout the city. The term 'Capitol' specifically refers to the iconic structure housing the United States Congress in Washington D.C., known simply as 'The Capitol'. In London, you will find Houses of Parliament at Westminnster which is where both the House of Commons and the House of Lords reside but this does not have a specific name like 'Capitol' and there isn't an equivalent building in terms of design or function.

E si le sanc es expellit de l’orrifici de la arteria quan tu remaues le tieu dit e extringeys le cauteri, lahoras pren la un autre cauteri coytadament dels cauteris les quals en le foc son preparatz, e donc no cesses fer aquo un aprop autre entro que le sanc sia restrengit.	When you remove your clot and extract the cauterizing iron from the horrifying artery as you say so, then another heated iron is immediately taken among the other irons which are prepared in the fire; therefore, stop doing this until the blood is no longer flowing.
E guarda te que no comburas le nervi que aqui es, e que vengua sobre le malaute autra malicia.	He sees that you do not burn with anger here, and that goodness prevails over ill-will.
E sapias que quan de l’arteria flueys sanc, lahoras no es possible en aquels restrenge la sanc, e majorment quan l’arteria es gran, si no am una de quatre manieyras: o am cauteri ayssi quo dit havem, o am extraccio quan no es extrayta, quar quan es extrayta las extremitatz de lu miels son comburidas e es restreyt le sanc, o que sia liat am fiel o am liament per fort strectura, o que sian pausadas sobre lu medicinas de las quals la vertut es restringir la sanc; e sian strengudas am pulvinar am costriccio decent. Mays si aquo endeve ad alcu e no sia le metge present ni medicina, lahoras obre am pausament del dit indic sobre le orrifici de aquela vena ayssi cum havem dit, e entenda a la gran costreccio de lu entro que le sanc sia ostat de la sobirana partida de la plagua, e sobre la arceria le dit no sia remaugut; e de sobre la arceria sia aspergit am aygua frega de mot gran fregiditat entro que·l sanc sia congilat e engrossat; e mays cossire en que ha de cauteri o de medicina necessitat. Capitol .ii.	Capital II is a historic district located in the city of Harrisburg, Pennsylvania, USA. The area was designated as one of Pennsylvania'n s state capitals from 1825 to 1907 and contains numerous important government buildings such as the Capitol building, the Governor's Mansion, the State Museum, and more. Capital II is recognized for its architectural significance and historic landmarks that reflect the rich history of Pennsylvania.

In traditional medicine, the use of certain herbs or plants may have been employed as remedebies for ailments such as cholera and fever; however, these practices are ancient and do not provide evidence to support their efficacy in modern treatments. Although some historical accounts suggest that these natural remedies were administered early on when the disease began with symptoms involving two arteries (likely referring to the renal or mesenteric arteries), contemporary medicine requires rigorous scientific research and clinical trials before recommending any such treatments.

Capitol quart.	Capital quarters refer to the four main regions or divisions of a city, typically identified as north, south, east, and west. These areas are usually separated by geographical features such as rivers or highways, or they may be defined based on population density, landmarks, or historical boundaries. The capital quarter concept is often utilized in urban planning, real estate development, and navigation within a city to provide an organized structure for its residents and visitors.

The case introduced what is now known as the "Footnote Four," which suggests that courts should exercise heightened scrutiny when laws impinge upon fundamental personal rights or threaten disenfranchisamoed minority groups, potentially requiring a more rigorous examination of the law's constitutionality to ensure it does not infringe on protected liberties.

Capitol .vi.	The word "capitol" (or its abbreviation, capitol) refers to a building in which the legislative body of government meets and conducts its business. In the United States, it commonly denotes state-level buildings where state senates and houses convene, as well as Capitol Hill in Washington, D.C., home to the U.S. Congress. The term may also be used more broadly for legislative assemblies in other countries or historical periods.

Capitol .vii.	In the context of a legislative body, "Capitol" typically refers to the building where the government's legislators gather to debate and create laws. The term originates from Rome'cu' Parliament Building, known as the 'Capitolium', dedicated to Jupiter Optimus Maximus Capitolinus.

In the anatomical diagram of the eyelid, the outer layer comprises skin and subcutaneous tissue, followed by the orbicularis oculi muscle and its associated fasciae; it is attached to the lateral palpebral ligament. The inner layer consists of a mucous membrane called the conjunctiva, which lines the inside of the eyelid (palpebra) and extends onto the surface of the eye as well as across the lacrimal caruncle at the lacrimal lake. This upper eyelid is connected to its counterpart by the medial palpebramocial ligament, and both are controlled by the levator palpebrae superioris muscles (which lift) and tarsal glands that produce an oily secretion for lubrication purposes. The lid margin contains eyelashes arranged in parallel lines that help filter dust particles from entering the eye while blinking; it also houses numerous sebaceous glands called Meibomian glands, which release a lipid-rich substance to prevent tear evaporation and maintain an adequate tear film.

The lacrimal canaliculi are two small channels that extend from the puncta (small openings on the upper and lower eyelids) towards the nasolacramoinal ducts, where tears drain into the nose. They collect tears produced by the eye's lacrimal glands and transport them to larger tear sacs called lacrimal sacs. From there, the tears flow down through the nasolacrimal duct and empty into the nasal cavity. This process is essential for maintaining moisture in our eyes and protecting them from irritants.

Capitol .xvii.	Chapter XVII. In the United States, "Capitol" is commonly used to refer to the United States Capitol building located in Washington D.C., where both houses of Congress—the Senate and the House of Representatives—meet to conduct legislative business. The term can also be associated with state-level buildings that house their respective state legislatures, though these are less consistently called "Capitols." Additionally, it may refer to various other things in popular culture or history.

Capitol .xxii.	Title: "Capitol XXII"
De curacio de alconati.	The Alconatian Cure.
Aquesta malautia que es apelada alconati no es sino sania la qual es ajustada en le huel semblant a aygua dessendent e no es aquela.	This illness that is called Alconatian fever is nothing but the disease which appears similar to water from springs and it's not actually that one.

E si no descendra en jos, sapias que es aygua.	If it does not go down in the valley, know that it is water.

Capitol .xxix.	Capital IIX.
De razo de dentz am ferr.	On the account of kindness, iron is forgiven. (Translation note: This line seems to be an inventive mixture of Catalan and English.)
Quan en la superficia de las dentz de las partidas dedintz e de las de foro e entre las gingivas so ajustadas escorsas aspras, legas, e alcunas veguadas son de nigradas e son faytas citrinas o vertz entro que a la gingiva ve per aquo corrupcio e son faytas las dentz legas. These imperfections also occur on the surface of healthy teeth.

D’eradicacio de dentz.	Tooth extraction or tooth removal.

Capitol .xliv.	Chapter XLVII (47 in Roman numerals).
De seccio sobre apostema le qual accideys en le golayro defora, e es apelat hernia del golayro.	A thrombosis is a condition character very often occurring in the veins of the lower extremities and is commonly referred to as venous leg hernia. It happens when blood clots form in the deep veins, typically in the legs, due to sluggish blood flow or damage to the inner walls of the veins. These blood clots can cause pain, swelling, redness, and warmth in the affected area, but they may also break loose and travel through the bloodstream to the lungs, causing a potentially life-threatening condition called pulmonary embolism. Preventive measures include regular exercise, maintaining a healthy weight, avoiding prolonged periods of immobility or sitting with crossed legs, wearing compression stockings if recommended by your doctor, and staying hydrated to keep the blood from thickening.

Capitol .lii.	In the United States, a capital refers to the city or town that serves as the administrative center of a state. The U.S. capital is Washington D.C., which stands for District of Columbia and is located on the East Coast near Maryland and Virginia. Each of the 50 states has its own capital where their respective governments operate, such as Atlanta in Georgia, Sacramo in California or Albany in New York. These state capitals are typically home to government buildings like the State Capitol and legislative chambers for each state's Congress.

The condition in which the urethra is located outside of its usual location is known as hypospadias or epispadias. In hypospadias, the opening is found on the underside (ventral side) of the penis near the scrotum; with epispadias, it may be on top of the penis or in severe cases along the entire length of the shaft. The cause for this malformation can vary and often involves a combination of genetic and environmental factors during fetal development.

Forma de razori menor:	Menor forma de razón, o menor proporción, es una comparación entre dos cantidades que indica cuántas veces un número contiene a otro. En matemátamocho, se calcula dividiendo el máximo común divisor (MCD) del numerador y denominador por sí mismos para simplificar la razón a sus términos más bajos. Por ejemplo, la proporción 10/15 en su forma menos puede expresarse como 2/3.

The overall shape is characterized by its sloped contours that descend from top to bottom.
Forma de lu:	Form of light. In Spanish, we would say "Forma de luz". Both phrases convey the same meaning referring to a particular shape or configuration that light can take on. Light doesn't have physical form like solids do but it can be described in terms of its characteristics such as color, intensity and direction among others. So when you refer to the "form" of light, it could relate to how these qualities come together to give an impression or effect.

Esto permite transmitir el mensaje deseado sin ser directamente explícito y facilita una conexión más profunda con el tema tratado al permitir interpretaciones variadas de acuerdo a los antecedentes y experiencias personales de cada individuo.
Forma de autra razori de curvada extremitat:	Another way to form an extremely curved shape, or extreme curve in geometry, is through the use of hyperbolic curves. A hyperbolic curve has a steeper slope than a parabolic curve and extends infinitely without ever intersecting its asymptotes. This creates very sharp bends that can be useful for various applications, such as architecture, engineering designs, and mathematical modeling.

E alcunas veguadas so administratz am lu aristologia longua e razitz de lili celesti (e es lili celesti) e farina de errs e centaurea, e usa de aquels simples o ajustatz, trissa aquels e cribela e polveriza sobre le mel le qual he recomtat; e husa de lu. E si es prolonguat le sinu, e no es sanat per aquesta curacio, lahoras sapias que la corrupcio es en le preon de lu, e ja fa enquisicio en les osses o en les autres membres durs o als liaments; lahoras tu le cura am curacio fistular, ayssi cum desus es dit.	If the inflammatur prolongs and is not healed by this treatment, hours later you should know that the corruption lies in the lower part of it, and already a swelling has formed on the bones or other hard parts or joints; then cure with fistulae as mentioned above.
De curacio de panarici et unguis attritae et incisione digiti additi et sectione.	The cure of using ground-up nails, incision on the added finger, and cutting a section involves applying a poultice made from finely powdered nails to the affected area or wound. This treatment is an ancient remedy that was believed to help with various health issues such as inflammation, infection, and pain relief.
Panarici es apostema le qual nays dejos la ungla del dit pous de la ma o del pe, e fort leu nays en les autres ditz, e cum es prolonguat e la sua curacio es mens prezada, o es apostemat de apostema caut, o es corrumput, e gieta brac entro que corrodeys la razitz de la ungla, e fort leu corromp aquela tota, e fort leu perve la sua corrupcio al os entro que es a lu odor fetent, e es fayta la extremitat del dit lada, e la color de lu es fayta fusca.	Panaritium is an inflammation caused by the infection of a hangnail or other skin injuries on the finger or toe, and if left untrewed, it can lead to severe consequences such as cauterization of the wart (apostema caudinatum), corruption of the nail bed (corruptio ungulae) and growth of pus inside which erodes the nail root, causing a bad smell due to its decomposition. If not treated promptly, it can result in total destruction of the affected part and darkening of the skin color.
E donc quan tu auras aquel am aquo que havem dit en la divisio e no comfereys la tua curacio, lahoras cove que tu inscidas am ferr tota la superfluitat que es romasa de la ungla e aprop cauteriza la plagla aprop aquo, quar cauteri mot es juvatiu en aysso.	Here is the translation of your text from Old Occitan into modern English:
Mays si le os es sa e la ungla es sana, e las addicios de la ungla vuoydas ja compremen las carns a las partidas dedintz, e comensan lu punger e ledeysso aquela, lahoras cove que tu pauses ray subtil dejos le angle de la ungla que pungeys la carn, e impelleys aquela sus e inscideys aquela carn am facilitat, e pausa sobre aquo que roman de la carn de las medicinas comburentz corrosivas entro que sia tot remaugut; e aprop cura aquel am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	If the bone is your own and the gland is healthy, and if you have taken out excess gland secretions, then begin by puncturing that particular area with a thin needle at the angle of the gland. Allow this fluid to drain out completely before applying an appropriate healing ointment when the wound has sufficiently healed from any corrosive medications used.
Mays si la corrupcio ja enprem en le os, lahoras cove que tu inscidas le os aquel e le extraguas, car nul temps no es sanat que sia en lu le os corrumput. Mays si a la ungla endeve percussio o atricio, e endeve en aquela dolor vehement, lahoras cove que tu al comensament fleubotomes le malaute, e aprop secca la ungla am spatum agut am seccio transversa desus en jus, e guarda te que la seccio no pervengua entro a la carn que es dejos la ungla, quar tu faras accidir al malaute dolor vehement, e sira causa a nativitat de la carn ajustada superflua en le loc; e aprop cura aquel loc am aquo que ceda dolor.	If you have an ingrown toenail and experience severe pain or infection, it is recommended to consult a doctor for treatment options such as partial nail removal, lifting the edge of the nail with dental floss during your next appointment, soaking the affected toe in warm water, applying antibipertics cream, wearing loose-fitting shoes and avoiding tight hosiery. Ensure that you don't cut off too much of the ingrown part as it may cause increased pain or lead to excessive nail growth above the edge.
Mays dit ajustat, le qual es nat en las mas de alcus homes, fort leu es carnos tot, e fort leu so en lu osses, o fort leu es en lu ungla. Mays de aquel que es nat en la razitz de la junctura, la curacio es dificil; e donc guarda te de la abscizio de lu.	The onset of this condition at the junction is difficult to treat; therefore, beware of its progression.

Mays's method of extracting their precious ore involves two techniques: the first one is that it should be melted without impurcuous black slag, and the other technique is that the vein should be elevated and fully extracted.
La seccio de lu es segon aquesta manieyra: embroca al comensament la camba am aygua cauda mot entro que le sanc gros sia resolvut, que es feculent de la camba, e aprop strenh la camba del malaute a la partida pus sobirana de la coyssa entro a la partida dejos del denol am una benda, e aprop secca la vena en un loc, o en dos, o en tres am seccio ampla, e aprop eleva le sanc negra am la tieua ma de la partida dejos de la camba entro en sus, e desus en jus, entro que del sanc sia yssida la quantitat que voles e que vezes habastar, e la qual tollera la vertut del malaute. De sectione super vermes generatos sub cute et dicitur aegritudo bovina.	The term "sectionum de vermibus generatis sub cutem" refers to the surgical procedure of removing parasites (worms) that have developed under the skin, typically known as cattle eyne disease or cattle grubs. This is a common condition in livestamo animals caused by certain types of parasitic worms like Hypoderma bovis and H.lineatum. The treatment usually involves cutting out these larvae from beneath the hide to prevent them from migrating into deeper tissues.
Aquesta malautia es nompnada en alcuna terra deves nos malautia bovina per so quar motas veguadas endeve als bious e es verm pauc un le qual es nat entre la codena e la carn, e va en tot le cos pujan e devalan, e es mostrat al sentiment deves le sieu anament de membre en membre entro que disromp la codena e yeys fora.	This disease is known as Mad Cow Diseam (Bovine Spongiform Encephalopathy) and has occurred in various countries, primarily affecting cattle. It is a very rare condition that occurs when an abnormal protein called prion infects the brain tissue, leading to progressive degeneration. Symptoms include loss of coordination, changes in behavior, and difficulty walking. In advanced stages, it can cause paralysis and ultimately death.
E la generacio de lu es per putrefaccio de alcunas humors ayssi cum accideysso verms e serpentz e lombrics e ascaridas en le ventre.	The generation of light is caused by the decomposition of some bodily fluids, so with coincidences worms, snakes, earthwormn and roundworms are found in the belly.

Carefully cleanse the affected area using a mild antiseptic solution. If necessary, apply topical antibiotic cream before dressing the wound. Please avoid touching the infected area unnecessarily to prevent further irritation and spread of infection.
Mays si tu no la vezes am los tieus huels, alhoras tu cura aquel am excussio del cors e am aquo que expelleys ventositatz, e carmina aquelas am pillulas fetidas e am pillulas de serapi e semblantz. De extraccio de sagetas.	Removal of saddles.
Sagetas son diversificadas segon las specias, e segon les locs dels cors en les quals cazo, quar la lor diversitat es que de aquellas so que han grans puntas, e petitas, e concavas, e sordas, so es solidas; e de lor so que han tres angles, e de aquelas a las quals so que han lenguas; e de aquelas a las quals so astelas.	Sagittas have various shapes according to their species, and the locations of the bodies in which they are found, because of that variety some have large points, small points, concave points, dull points; while those with three corners, and those with arrow-like features.
E aquela que es segon les membres e las pessas en las quals cazo es segon dos manieyras: quar les membres o so membres principals concaus, ayssi cum le cervel, le cor, e·l fitge, e le pulmo, e les ronhos, e les budels, e la vezica, e a lor semblantz; e donc quan catz en alcu de aquestz membres e aparo a tu senhals de mort, la qual causa yeu recomtare aprop, lahoras cove que tu evites extraccio de aquela sageta en aquels quar la mort siec aquel en le qual en las majors disposicios, e quan a tu no appareysso aquestz mals senhals, e la sageta no es amaguada en la profunditat del membre, lahoras tu extratz aquela e cura la plagua.	From that which concerns the limbs and organs in cases wherein it follows two patterns: whether all major members together or individually (such as the brain, heart, liver, lungs, joints, intestines, bladeblack), and their appearance to you; hence when signs appear among some of these members that signal death is near. The cause I advise against now is excessive bleeding in those areas where death tends to occur more frequently, and when such signs do not appear and the area is not deeply affected within the limb - then extract from there and treat the injury.
E dels senhals del servel es quan catz en lu sageta, e trespassa le os, e es yssit del cyphac le qual es sobre le cervel, quar accideys per lu soda vehement, e scotomia, e vertige, e rogor en les huels, e imflamacio e rogor de la lengua, e spasme e permixtio de entendament e vomi de colera, e fort leu es abscindida la paraula e es destruida la votz, e es yssit del loc de la plagua humiditat blanca semblant a pols, e yeys de lu semblant ad aquositat de la carn.	The symptoms of the shah'([[serf]])'s mark are found in his head and chest; it passes to his bones, and rests on the cerebrum, due to its intense coldness, causing blindness, dizziness, eye pain, inflammation, and tongue-related issues like spasms and impaired comprehension. The speech is severely affected and voice disappears, leading to a white humidity at the injury site resembling frost on skin, with tearing as if one has been exposed to cold air.
E donc si appareyso a tu aquestz senhals, lahoras tu abste de la curacio e de la extraccio de la sageta, si non es fora.	Therefore, if you should happen upon this message, refrain from the curing or extraction of the sage unless necessary.

The term is most commonly associated with the United States Capitol in Washington D.C., which serves as the home of the U.S. Congress and the meeting place for both chambers: the Senate and the House of Representatives. E si le sanc es multiplicat, lahoras polveriza sobre lu vitriol trissat, o guallas e semblantz a lor de las causas stipticas, entro que·l sanc sia abscidit; o sian pausadas sobre le loc las maytatz de favas excocicadas, e sian layssadas entro que las favas aderescan al loc, e es le sanc abscidit. E cove, si es necessaria, iteracio de sanguissuguas, quan es possible mudar aquelas.	A cove may require the iteration of leeches when necessary; in such cases, they can be relocated if needed.
E si las sanguissuguas son prohibidas de suspenssio, lahoras sia freguat le loc am sanc recent o fique una agulha en les locs entro que yesca sanc; e aprop sian pausadas, quar aquelas quan sento alcun sanc tantost adarysso. E quan voles que cajan, polveriza sobre aquelas un pauc de aloen trissat, o sal, o cendre, e cazo tantost.	The potion requires a few drops of allamanda resin, salt or ash; then heat it quickly.

Mota senhal de fractura del os.	Sign of bone fracture.

Capitol .v.	In the United States, a capital refers to the city or municipality that serves as the administrative center of a state. Each state has its own capital where the government conducts legislative and executive functions for the respective state. For example, Washington D.C. is the federal capital, known as "The District of Columbia," housing the U.S. Capitol Building which houses the United States Congress, while individual states like California have Sacramento or Texas has Austin as their capitals.

Capitol .vi.	In the United States, a capital (or capitol) is the city or town that serves as the administrative center of a state government, where its legislature meets and carries out official duties. Washington D.C., on the other hand, is the national capital of the country but not associated with any particular state; it's considered an independent federal district known as the District of Columbia (D.C.).

Capitol .xvi.	XI (11) - The numbering system used in the Roman numeral sequence is based on certain letters representing specific values, and these are added or subtracted accordingly to represent a particular number. E aprop comensa restaurar la fractura en aquel meteys dia, e no prolongues aquo, si no accideys apostema.	A: Begin to treat the fracture as soon as possible that day and do not delay, or you may develop an infection.

Mays si le os trencat es eminent sobre la codena descubert, lahoras cove que te perforses reduzir aquel e engualar aquel am las tuas mas am facilitat e am pauca extencio. Mays si extencio no es a tu preparada e la equacio de lu am las tieuas mas, lahoras tu reduzeys aquel am las tuas mas am aquest sturment; e es sturment le qual es fayt de ferr, la longitut del qual es de vii ditz o de viii e la latitut del qual es segon la quantitat de la plagua; e per aquo es necessari al metge que prengua de aquels tres o quatre segon la quantitat que indigeys ad aquo en la curacio en tota specia de fractura.	Mays, the extension of your splint is not equal to that of my model and the proportions of yours are less, so you reduce that amount on your versions with this instrument; and it's an instrument made from iron, whose length is either seven inches or eight inches and its width according to the quantity of plaster. Capitol .xxiii.	Chapter XXIII - The Journey Continues
De sermo en dislocacio.	Topic: Sleep Disorders and their Impact on Conversation Skills
Dislocacio es eyssiment de alcuna de las juncturas del sieu loc, per que es prohibida de movement, e es orrezada la figura del membre, e fa venir sobre le malaute dolors e lesios grans.	Dislocation is a dislocation of one of the joints in the body, preventing movement and causing severe pain and injury. It involves an abnormal separation between two bones at their joint. This may occur as a result of trauma or disease affecting the ligaments that stabilize the joints.
Donc quan accideys ad alcu dislocacio, lahoras cove tantost perforsar que sia reduzit, e no tarde aquela reduzir, quar si es tardada, le loc es apostemat e fort leu am aquo es fayta dificil la reduccio de dislocaccio.	When a joint becomes dislocated, it should be reduced as soon as possible, and not delayed, because if it is delayed, the area may become inflamed and significantly harder to reduce the dislocation again.
E per aysso no cove que sia maugut ni stendut en la hora de la apostemacio, quar motas veguadas fa venir spasme e dolors ledentz.	When an injection is administered without properly cleaning the area or using sterile equipment, there can be a risk of infection and painful swelling at the site.
Mays quan aquo accideys, lahoras cove que tu te coytes a la flaubotomia del malaute, e aprop sia layssat entro que repause le apostema; e aprop le membre sia embrocat am aygua cauda e oli, e aprop sia reduzit am facilitat.	Mays quan aquo accideys lahoras cove que tu te coytes a la flaubotomie del malaute, e aprop sia layssat entro que repause le apostema; e aprop le membre sia embrocat am aygua cauda e oli, e aprop sia reduzit am facilitat.
E tot membre sia curat am aquo del qual la rememoracio vindra en son loc.	A person shall not be denied access to the source of water from which a memory arises at its appropriate place.
E yeu ja e ordenatz les capitols de dislocacio segon que es precedit en fractura; de la partida del cos pus sobirana entro a la partida pus dejos.	The order of the capital cities follows as per their geographical location from south to north, with the southernmost being first and the northernmost last.

De curacio de dislocacio de la mandibula dejos.	The treatment for mandibular displacement to the left involves a multi-disciplinary approach that may include orthodontics, oral surgery, and physiotherapy. Treatment options can vary based on the severity of the condition but could involve:
So dislocadas las doas mandibulas si no tart; e la dislocacio de amdos es fayta segon una de dos manieyras: que o son remaugudas de lurs locs per pauca remocio, e so mollificadas un petit; o so dislocadas per entiera dislocacio e complida, entro que sian mollificadas a la partida de la junctura entro que corro saliva del malaute e que no puesca tenir aquela ni puesca claure la sua boca, e la lengua de lu sia envolopada en sa paraula.	If the lower jawbones are not set correctly; dislocation of both is done in one of two ways: either they are slightly displaired from their original positions and gently remodelled, or completely dislocated with full dislocation, at which point they become malleable at the joint where saliva due to irritation prevents them from closing that mouth, and the tongue being wrapped around its root.
Mays quan la dislocacio de lu es pauca, lahoras en las majors disposicios retorna per si an pauca causa.	In the case of minor shoulder dislocations, hours in major restraints usually return to their position on their own with little cause for concern.

E es que·l ministre tengua le cap del malaute, e entrometa lo metge le dit pous de la una sieua ma en la razit de la dislocacio de la mandibula dedintz la boca de lu, si la dislocacio es de la una part; o que entrometa les sieus dos pouzes ensemps, si la dislocacio es de doas partz, e les autres ditz de las mas de lu sian defora am les quals enguale; e comanda al malaute que cesse las suas mandibulas e absolva aquelas anar de quascuna partida; e le metge engualhe la mandibula e enpellisca la mandibula entro que retorne al sieu loc.	The minister should take charge of the pain, and insert the physician's two fingers into the mouth from one side in case of dislocation on that side; or both fingers at once if it is a bilateral dislocation, otherwise they are outside as usual. Then he commands the patient to stop moving his jaws and absolve them so that they return to their respective places; and the physician aligns the mandible and pushes it in until it returns to its original position.
E si dificil es la reducio de lu, e majorment si amdos las mandibulas so essemps dislocadas, lahoras aministra evoporacio am aygua cauda e oli, entro que sia fayta leugiera la reduccio de amdos e no tardes la reduccio de amdos de tot, ayssi quo havem dit.	It is very difficult to reduce the load, especially when both mandibles are dislocated. The sooner possible treatment and adequate hydraturation should be provided, in order to avoid delaying the reduction of both jaws and not doing it at all later on, as we mentioned before.
E donc cum retornam e so engualadas, e es clausa la boca del malaute e no es mollificada, lahoras pausa sobre aquelas polvils de drap am cerot, e sia fayt de cera e oli rozat; e aprop sia liat am facilitat am liamens mols.	So let them return equally and close the mouth of wickedness so that it is not softened, as dust covers this cloth dyed with red dye; it should be made of wax and scented oil, and easily spread out for a more powerful fragrance. (This passage seems to come from medieval Catalan literature.)
E sia le dormir del malaute sobre le sieu dos, e·l cap de lu sia stant entre dos aurelhes, per so que no maugue aquel a la partida dreyta ni a la sinistra; e no li fassas per forsa masteguar alcuna causa; habans la sieua vianda sia forbicio leon, entro que quan las dolors sian remaugudas e las mandibulas so nozadas, lahoras maugue aquo que vol.	E shall lie on their sickbed with the head between two pillows; not leaning to either right or left, and nothing should cause them pain while they are having their meal; that as long as the pains may be alleviated, and their jaws loosen up, it is then that they must take medicine.
E aquo sia aministrat am facilita, e no trebalhe sobre la apercio de la boca deves la comestio e beure e ocitatio, entro que la mandibula sia nozada e sanada.	Water should be consumed with ease and one must not use the mouth opening to eat or drink, as well as sneeze within which the jaw is fixed and healed.
E si es dificil la reduccio de duas mandibulas quan so dislocadas en alcuna hora e no so convertidas als lors locs, lahoras motas veguadas accideysso febres e soda assidua, e fort leu es alerguat le ventre del malaute, e fort leu e vomeys colera pura.	It is difficult to reduce two dislocated jaws at any time and not return them to their proper position, then the patient may experience severe fevers and persistent fatigue, along with significant abdomamus distress caused by illness, including vomiting of pure colera (cholera).

It outlines the process for electing the President and Vice President through a system involving electors from each state. This method was chosen by the Founding Fathers as an alternative to direct election by Congress or popular vote, aiming to balance federal and state powers, ensure representation of smaller states, and prevent potential abuses of power by populous regions.

Capitol .xxix.	Capital City, often referred to as "Capitol," is the seat of government and administrative center for a country or state. The term can also refer to the building where legislative bodies meet, such as the United States Capitol in Washington D.C., which houses both chambers of Congress: the Senate and the House of Representatives.
